name: e
description: A breakout example using an Entity Component System

scripts.watch-production: watch "cat dist/breakout.js | exorcist dist/breakout.js.map > dist/breakout.exorcist.js;  uglifyjs dist/breakout.exorcist.js --in-source-map dist/breakout.js.map  --source-map dist/breakout.min.js.map > dist/breakout.min.js" src --wait 2

author: james.a.forbes@gmail.com <=> (http://james-forbes.com)
